meanings.definition: An aircraft with floats for landing on water.
meanings.sent1: The floatplane glided smoothly on the water.
meanings.sent2: The floatplane took off from the lake effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The floatplane waved to the boats below as it taxied on the water.
meanings.sent4: The floatplane was a graceful swan on the lake's surface.
meanings.sent5: Children on the shore cheered as the floatplane soared above the water.

meanings.sent1: I dream of learning to floatplane over the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We will floatplane to the remote island for our vacation.
meanings.sent3: The tourists excitedly prepared to floatplane for the first time.
meanings.sent4: She floatplaned across the vast sea of clouds.
meanings.sent5: Floatplaning gives a unique perspective of the world below.

meanings.sent1: The floatplane pilot skillfully landed on the calm lake.
meanings.sent2: My uncle is a seasoned floatplane pilot.
meanings.sent3: The floatplane pilot joked that ducks envy his job.
meanings.sent4: She admired the floatplane pilot's courage and precision.
meanings.sent5: The floatplane pilot's stories of adventure were captivating.
